entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 15 cm over the Cypress Hills. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
